attributes.action: Let tier 4  have Christmas Day with 1 other family
attributes.additional_details: I’m proposing this because taking all days away after giving 5 days over the festive season has taken a great impact on families mentally and physically and feel having the one day will really  help families feel at peace and in spirit after such a tough year. It’s been a challenging year for so many people but know families was looking forward to spending some time with family after such a hard year.
attributes.background: Would like to propose a one day leeway over Christmas, for Christmas Day to spend with one other family

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Reinstate the 5-day relaxation of COVID restrictions over Christmas: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564204

Allow families to have Christmas day together in all tiers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564312
